summary: On the meandering Canal St. Martin, at the Parisian Hôtel du Nord, a nearly fatal gunshot separates a dejected young couple. But, amid a sad but beautiful panorama of lively characters, love has the final say. Can life be a fairy tale?
cast: Annabella|Jean-Pierre Aumont|Louis Jouvet|Arletty|Paulette Dubost|Andrex|André Brunot|Henri Bosc|Marcel André|Bernard Blier|Jacques Louvigny|Armand Lurville|Jane Marken|Génia Vaury|François Périer|René Bergeron|René Alié|Charles Bouillaud|Dora Doll|Albert Malbert|Marcel Melrac|Marcel Pérès|Raymone
title: Hôtel du Nord
